author: Special Correspondent
text:
MDMK general secretary Vaiko and VCK leader Thol. Thirumavalavan on Friday met TMC leader G.K. Vasan and requested him to join the People’s Welfare Front (PWF).

“We met him at a marriage of Mr. Vaiko’s friend. We told him that the PWF was the only alternative to the Dravidian parties and the DMDK had already become part of it. If the TMC joins, it will further strengthen it,” Mr. Thirumavalavan told The Hindu .

Mr. Vaiko was with Mr. Thirumavalavan during the discussion.

“All Mr. Vasan would say is that he would consider the request ( paarkalam ),” said Mr. Thirumavalavan adding, “We asked him to take a decision quickly.”

Senior TMC leader B.S. Gnanadesikan was also present.
title: Thirumavalavan, Vaiko meet Vasan
